name: 陳錦華
objective:
本課程主要在於幫助學生學習商業簡報的專業技巧。主要議題包括口語表達技巧、投影片設計、以及求職面談要領等。課程內容對於商業實務的應用部分也會在課程中討論。
This course aims to help students to develop professional skills in business presentation. Topics include (but not limited to) oral presentation skills, powerpoint designing, and employment interview tips. Implications for managerial practice will be discussed in this class.
